formats.commandUnknown: Unknown Command "{0}".  Type {1}help to see valid Commands for this bot.
formats.commandChannelCleared: Output channel override for {0} removed, default value "{1}" will be used.
formats.commandRemoveAliasNotFoundAvaliable: Aliases that can be removed are: {0}.
formats.commandPostNotFound: Raid post with Id "{0}" not found.
formats.commandGuildNoChannel: {0} does not contain a channel named "{1}".
formats.commandChannelNotPinned: {0} has not been added to Pin Channels.
formats.commandTimezoneSuccess: Time zone for {0} changed to GMT{1}.
formats.commandLanguageSuccess: Language for {0} changed to "{1}".  If language config is not available to the bot, "en-us" will be used.

strings.helpTop: This bot parses discord chat messages to see if a raid is being mentioned.  If a raid is found, it will post to a specific channel, by default "{0}".  Channels can be configured to pin the raid instead of posting it to the specific channel.
strings.helpJoin: Joins the specified number of people to the specified raid Id. Overwrites any previous values.
strings.helpUnJoin: Removes your join information from the raid.
strings.helpInfo: Displays information about the selected raid, or all of the raids above rank 3.  Information was taken from https://pokemongo.gamepress.gg.
strings.helpChannel: Changes the bot output channel on this server to the value passed in for [name].  If blank, the override is removed and the value "{0}" is used.
strings.helpNoChannel: Prevents bot from posting in any specific channel.  Pin functionality can still be used in specific channels.
strings.helpAlias: Adds an alias for a pokemon.
strings.helpRemoveAlias: Removes an alias for a pokemon.
strings.helpDelete: Deletes a raid post with the corresponding Id.
strings.helpPin: Raids posted in the specified channel will be posted and pinned in the channel itself.
strings.helpPinAll: Adds all channels on the server to pin channels.
strings.helpUnPinAll: Removes all channels on the server from pin channels.
strings.helpTimezone: Will set the GMT offset of the discord server [gmt offset] for all time output.
strings.helpLanguage: Will set the language of the server.  A language file with the matching name must exist in bot config.  Default is "en-us"
strings.helpAdmin: Requires Server Admin or Manage Server Permissions.
strings.commandNoAccess: You do not have the necessary permissions to change this setting.  You must be a server moderator or administrator to make this change.
strings.commandNoChannelSuccess: Bot will no longer output to a single channel.  Use !channel to undo this.
strings.commandNoPostAccess: Only the creator of the post, server mods, or administrators can modify raid posts.
strings.commandUnPinAllSuccess: All channels removed from Pin Channels.
strings.commandPinAllSuccess: All channels added to Pin Channels.
